etymology.description: Depicts the human spine and ribs, resembling a skeletal structure.
etymology.interpretation: The character 骨(骨) (gǔ, "bone") visually represents the shape and layout of a human spine and ribs.

examples.chinese: 这根骨很坚硬(這根骨很堅硬)。
老中医观察骨的脉络(老中醫觀察骨的脈絡)，寻找健康之秘(尋找健康之秘)。
examples.pinyin: Lǎo zhōngyī guānchá gǔ de màiluò, xúnzhǎo jiànkāng zhī mì.
examples.english: The experienced Chinese doctor examines the bone structure to seek the secret of health.
